import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-render', templateUrl: './list-render.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-render.component.css'] }) export class ListRenderComponent { //Os dados aqui viriam do banco animals = [ {name: "Alef", type:"Horse"}, {name: "Bigode", type:"Dog"}, {name: "Odin", type:"Cat"} ] }
